mapper.select: SELECT id, batch_name AS batchName, batch_code AS batchCode, batch_no AS batchNo, goods_code AS goodsCode,status FROM batch WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY id ASC limit #{count}
mapper.update: UPDATE batch SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, batch_name AS batchName, batch_code AS batchCode, batch_no AS batchNo, goods_code AS goodsCode,status FROM batch WHERE status = 1 AND goods_code = #{goodsCode} ORDER BY id ASC limit 1

SELECT batch_name AS name, batch_code AS batchCode, good_spec_id as goodSpecId,count(1) as number,date_format(created_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as createTime FROM batch group by good_spec_id,batch_code,batch_name,created_time limit #{startPage},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT batch_name AS name, batch_code AS batchCode, batch_no as goodSpecId,count(1) as number,date_format(created_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as createTime FROM batch group by good_spec_id,batch_code,batch_name,created_time) as a
